entry.title: Let's deploy BIP65 CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY!
entry.summary: John Winslow, a Bitcoin investor and non-programmer, made two observations in a message posted on the bitcoin-dev mailing list. However, Rusty Russell, a developer who is part of the Bitcoin community, requested that the post be removed from the mailing list. No further information was provided regarding what John's observations were or why Rusty asked for the post to be taken down. The bitcoin-dev mailing list is known for being a forum for technical discussions related to Bitcoin development.
